#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		int p, y;
		scanf("%d %d", &p, &y);
		y -= 2000;
		unsigned long long res = p;
		for (int i = 1; i <= y; i++)
			res = (res*res)%1000000007;
		printf("%lld\n", res);
	}
	return 0;
}
